# Learning Objectives
By the end of the week, learners will be able to: 

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
* Differentiate between a statistic and parameter
  * Calculate sample statistics from data using formulas
  * Estimate a population total
  * Explain why estimates vary from sample to sample
  * Create and describe a sampling distribution of a sample statistic
  * Define in english and mathematically accuracy, bias and precision
  * Calculate and interpret a confidence interval
  *

<!-- end of list -->
:::
:::


# How to prepare

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
* Download the `StatisticsPhD.csv` data file into your **data** folder.
  * Follow the instructions for the cn03 in Canvas.

<!-- end of list -->
